snippet.title: PySide GUI application development
snippet.description: PySide GUI application development / Loganathan, Venkateshwaran An accessible and practical guide to developing GUI's for Python applications.This book is written for Python programmers who want to learn about GUI programming. [...] Birmingham : Packt Publishing, 2013. - 140 p.

snippet.title: Programming Python
snippet.description: Programming Python . \- 4th ed. / Lutz, Mark If you've mastered Python's fundamentals, you're ready to start using it to get real work done [...] Beijing : O'Reilly, 2011. - 1584 p.

snippet.title: COMPUTING
snippet.description: COMPUTING / I. Fisk ; P. Kreuzer ; J. Flix ; O. Gutsche ; M. Klute ; K. Lassila-Perini ; S. Malik ; G. Grandi and J. Hernandez Calama Introduction CMS distributed computing system performed well during the 2011 start-up. The events in 2011 have more pile-up and are more complex than last year; this results in longer reconstruction times and harder events to simulate [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2011-019.- 2011 \- Published in : , no. 2/2011, pp. 15

snippet.title: OFFLINE
snippet.description: OFFLINE / L. Silvestris ; T. Boccali ; L. Sexton-Kennedy. Edited by M-C Sawley and J. Harvey, with ; contributions from F. Cossutti ; F. Stockli ; S. Banerjee ; M.Hildreth ; D.Lange ; J-R. Vlimant ; G. Cerminara et al. Introduction Since the last CMS Bulletin, the CMS Collaboration has successfully achieved many milestones and the Offline Group has played a central role in the fulfillment of all of them. While many moments have been of historical importance for the whole Collaboration (the first 7 TeV collisions, the huge media coverage on March 30th, the constant increase in luminosity), we consider the level of efficient and sustained operations the group was able to reach over this period as our main achievement [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2010-034.- 2010 \- Published in : , no. 2/2010, pp. 17

snippet.title: Python : pocket reference
snippet.description: Python : pocket reference . \- 4th ed. / Lutz, Mark This is the book to reach for when you're coding on the fly and need an answer now [...] Sebastopol, CA : O'Reilly, 2010. - 198 p.

snippet.title: Learning Python
snippet.description: Learning Python . \- 4th ed. / Lutz, Mark Google and YouTube use Python because it's highly adaptable, easy to maintain, and allows for rapid development [...] Sebastopol, CA : O'Reilly, 2009. - 1160 p.

snippet.title: OFFLINE
snippet.description: OFFLINE / S. Abdoulline ; P. Azzi ; A. Meyer ; G. Della Ricca ; F. Cossutti ; F. Ambroglini ; A. Pfeiffer ; F. Stoeckli ; R. Chierici ; D. Futyan et al. The main activity since spring 2009 has continued to involve integration and validation of a wide range of new features from all subsystems in a major new release series (CMSSW_3_x). Much attention has been given to optimization of both code and data formats in order to keep the cpu time, memory footprint and data storage requirements within ‘budget’ [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2009-213.- \- Published in : , no. 3/2009, pp. 16

snippet.title: OFFLINE
snippet.description: OFFLINE / John Harvey ; Lucia Silvestris ; Marie-Christine Sawley ; Filippo Ambroglini ; Fabio Cossutti ; Ilaria Segoni ; Rainer Mankel ; David Futyan ; David Evans ; Simon Metson et al. Over the last 3 months the Offline project has been focussed on the integration and validation of the CMSSW_2_1_X production release, which is the last release cycle before data-taking starts. The goal has been to include all essential missing functionality, such as the final geometry and the new magnetic field map, and to continue to extend the data quality monitoring and physics analysis capabilities of the software [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2009-074.- \- Published in : , no. 3/2008, pp. 15

snippet.title: COMPUTING
snippet.description: COMPUTING / Matthias Kasemann ; Patricia McBride ; Marie-Christine Sawley ; Peter Kreuzer ; Daniele Bonacorsi ; Christoph Paus ; Lother Bauerdick ; Kati Lassila-Perini ; Akram Khan Overview The main focus during the summer was to handle data coming from the detector and to perform Monte Carlo production. The lessons learned during the CCRC and CSA08 challenges in May were addressed by dedicated PADA campaigns lead by the Integration team [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2009-073.- \- Published in : , no. 3/2008, pp. 14
